Description.Name: Capt. Jack
Description.Details:
Jack Amaris, better known as "Captain Jack", was born on some world that was once part of the long dead Rim Worlds Republic. Growing up hearing stories of his distant relative and being taught from a young age that House Steiner was to blame for the hardships forced on his world because of their destruction of the RWR, Jack turned to a life of piracy at the young age of 16.

Rising through the ranks fairly quickly, it became apparent that Jack had an affinity for fixing and understanding LosTech, and he was particularly fascinated by the HPG network administered by ComStar.

Jack was eventually made captain of his crew after the previous captain came down with a good, old-fashioned case of being Atlas-stomped. As captain, Jack launched raids into the Lyran Commonwealth, and after accidentally capturing a world with a functional HPG, he at last had a chance to undertake an in-depth study of one.

As a result of this study, Jack was able to successfully create a miniature version of hyperpulse generator technology with a shorter range. Calling his invention 'WiFi' after an ancient Terran wireless communication technology, Jack led the Valkyrate pirates in an attempt to spread this new technology to all worlds within their reach. Favoring the use of scavenged Atlas 'Mechs to turn into 'WiFi towers', Jack eventually created a network of systems and a pirated content service, much to the annoyance of ComStar.

On more than one occasion, Jack raided the Lyran capital of Tharkad just to acquire more Atlas towers. Eventually, he was forced to retreat from the front due to his health, but the Valkyrate carried on his work, plundering the Commonwealth. Jack's final contribution was helping to invent the amazing 'GoatFi' technology.
